workflow.title: Item rating predictions collaborative-based
workflow.description: This workflow takes input 2 as as train set for several item recommendation predictions. We build four different recommendation model which are combined into one model with operator Model Combiner. Then we take input 1 as a test set and apply merged model. Train and test set must contain user_id, item_id and rating attributes which need to have special roles user identification, item identification and label. This workflow uses recommender system extension.
